rev.comment: fair use album covers not permitted on discographies
rev.diff:
Line 1: Line 1: â
[[Image:Marvin-gaye-grapevine.jpg|thumb|250px|right|After the [[Norman Whitfield]]-produced #1 smash, "[[I Heard It Through the Grapevine]]", became huge, the title of Marvin Gaye's album changed from ''In the Groove'' to ''[[I Heard It Through the Grapevine (album)|I Heard It Through the Grapevine]]'', and was re-released in 1969.]]
  â  
This is a listing of all of the singles and albums released by [[United States|American]] [[R&B]]/[[soul]] legend [[Marvin Gaye]]. Forty-one of his singles reached the ''[[Billboard magazine|Billboard]]'' Top 40 in the US; eighteen reached the ''Billboard'' Top 10 and three of them reached #1.
This is a listing of all of the singles and albums released by [[United States|American]] [[R&B]]/[[soul]] legend [[Marvin Gaye]]. Forty-one of his singles reached the ''[[Billboard magazine|Billboard]]'' Top 40 in the US; eighteen reached the ''Billboard'' Top 10 and three of them reached #1.
